meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a public protest or demonstration.
meanings.sent1: The demonstrators marched peacefully through the streets, holding up signs.
meanings.sent2: The group of demonstrators chanted slogans outside the government building.
meanings.sent3: The demonstrators wore colorful hats to stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The sea of demonstrators flooded the square, a wave of voices demanding change.
meanings.sent5: The image of the determined demonstrators lingered in the minds of onlookers.

meanings.definition: A group of people who gather together to show support for a particular cause or idea.
meanings.sent1: Many demonstrators gathered in the park to raise awareness about climate change.
meanings.sent2: The enthusiastic demonstrators cheered for their team at the rally.
meanings.sent3: The demonstrators brought homemade cookies to share during the event.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of colorful umbrellas, a symbol of unity among the demonstrators.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the demonstrators' voices echoed through the streets, a powerful chorus of solidarity.
